rules.name: Rule Introduce Yourself Chief Alchemist Vol

dialog.speaker: 'Jafar'
dialog.content: Greetings Chief Alchemist Vol, I am Jafar, newly appointed Vizier to the Sultan.
parts: 'Greetings Chief Alchemist Vol, I am Jafar, newly appointed Vizier to the Sultan.'

dialog.speaker: 'Chief Alchemist Vol'
dialog.content: Hmm? Oh yes, yes I suppose that is you. . . Oh! Yes! Right you are the new Vizier I knew of your coming.
parts: 'Hmm? Oh yes, yes I suppose that is you. . . Oh! Yes! Right you are the new Vizier I knew of your coming.'

dialog.speaker: 'Jafar'
dialog.content: Forgive me Chief Alchemist, but you appear in distress, what is troubling you?
parts: 'Forgive me Chief Alchemist, but you appear in distress, what is troubling you?'

dialog.speaker: 'Chief Alchemist Vol'
dialog.content: Oh its . . . its nothing, well no, I'm afraid I've misplaced some of my ingredients. The Sultan is expecting an update on my latest invention and I, I, I . . .
parts: 'Oh its . . . its nothing, well no, I'm afraid I've misplaced some of my ingredients. The Sultan is expecting an update on my latest invention and I, I, I . . .'

rules.name: Rule Chief Alchemist Vol sist1
rules.displayAs: Perhaps I could help you find them

dialog.speaker: 'Jafar'
dialog.content: Fear not, I will help you find these missing ingredients, what is it that we seek?
parts: 'Fear not, I will help you find these missing ingredients, what is it that we seek?'

dialog.speaker: 'Chief Alchemist Vol'
dialog.content: Oh Marvelous! Yes, yes the ingredients . . . they are, hmm . . . one part stardust, yes, one part water, three part flax seed, and . . . and yes two parts dragonfly wing. I'm sure they are around here somewhere, somewhere in all this chaos.
parts: 'Oh Marvelous! Yes, yes the ingredients . . . they are, hmm . . . one part stardust, yes, one part water, three part flax seed, and . . . and yes two parts dragonfly wing. I'm sure they are around here somewhere, somewhere in all this chaos.'

rules.name: Rule Chief Alchemist Vol sist2
rules.displayAs: I have the ingredients you were looking for

dialog.speaker: 'Jafar'
dialog.content: Chief Alchemist, I have gathered the ingredients you required, what now shall we do with them?
parts: 'Chief Alchemist, I have gathered the ingredients you required, what now shall we do with them?'

dialog.speaker: 'Chief Alchemist Vol'
dialog.content: Oh perfection at its finest! Come then, come then and see what but the simplest of ingredients can yield!
parts: 'Oh perfection at its finest! Come then, come then and see what but the simplest of ingredients can yield!'

dialog.speaker: 'Jafar'
dialog.content: What is it that you wrought Chief Alchemist?
parts: 'What is it that you wrought Chief Alchemist?'

dialog.speaker: 'Chief Alchemist Vol'
dialog.content: An ingenious potion that will restore the energy of its consumer! But the work does not stop here, we still more to do.
parts: 'An ingenious potion that will restore the energy of its consumer! But the work does not stop here, we still more to do.'

dialog.speaker: 'Jafar'
dialog.content: What else must be done to finish your work?
parts: 'What else must be done to finish your work?'

dialog.speaker: 'Chief Alchemist Vol'
dialog.content: Now we need gold but, the Sultan would not have me taking any of his. Instead he allows me to take lesser metals and transmute them into gold. Take this note, give it to the Treasury Guard and they will allow you passage into the vaults. We, we need one iron bar, one bronze bar, one steel bar, and one copper bar.
parts: 'Now we need gold but, the Sultan would not have me taking any of his. Instead he allows me to take lesser metals and transmute them into gold. Take this note, give it to the Treasury Guard and they will allow you passage into the vaults. We, we need one iron bar, one bronze bar, one steel bar, and one copper bar.'

rules.name: Rule Chief Alchemist Vol sist5
rules.displayAs: I have the metals you ked for

dialog.speaker: 'Jafar'
dialog.content: I have returned with the materials you desired Chief Alchemist.
parts: 'I have returned with the materials you desired Chief Alchemist.'

dialog.speaker: 'Chief Alchemist Vol'
dialog.content: Hmm? Oh yes! The metals, now you must turn away as I conduct alchemy's greatest feat and transmute these, these, these, sad common metals into something truly worthy of a Sultan.
parts: 'Hmm? Oh yes! The metals, now you must turn away as I conduct alchemy's greatest feat and transmute these, these, these, sad common metals into something truly worthy of a Sultan.'

dialog.speaker: 'Jafar'
dialog.content: Chief Alchemist Vol, we have brewed a potent elixir and transmuted ordinary metal into the finest gold. What other greatness can there be that you have not already exceeded?
parts: 'Chief Alchemist Vol, we have brewed a potent elixir and transmuted ordinary metal into the finest gold. What other greatness can there be that you have not already exceeded?'

dialog.speaker: 'Chief Alchemist Vol'
dialog.content: Power, Power! We, we are very close now, yes sooo close. The Sultan requires power to rule his Empire, and I shall give him that power. I must ask you, to to to get but one more item for me. I need sand, lots of sand.
parts: 'Power, Power! We, we are very close now, yes sooo close. The Sultan requires power to rule his Empire, and I shall give him that power. I must ask you, to to to get but one more item for me. I need sand, lots of sand.'

dialog.speaker: 'Jafar'
dialog.content: Okay Vol, I have given you all that you have asked, now I am done playing errand boy. Show me this power you speak of and I shall deem whether it is worthy of the Sultan's attention.
parts: 'Okay Vol, I have given you all that you have asked, now I am done playing errand boy. Show me this power you speak of and I shall deem whether it is worthy of the Sultan's attention.'

dialog.speaker: 'Chief Alchemist Vol'
dialog.content: Of of course. Beyond the miracle of flameless fire!
parts: 'Of of course. Beyond the miracle of flameless fire! '

dialog.speaker: 'Jafar'
dialog.content: Chief Alchemist . . . this is incredible, such a source of portable energy is, is unbelievable!
parts: 'Chief Alchemist . . . this is incredible, such a source of portable energy is, is unbelievable! '

dialog.speaker: 'Chief Alchemist Vol'
dialog.content: You need not suspend your believe my lord, merely adjust your mindset. Many things are possible when the parts are in the right place.
parts: 'You need not suspend your believe my lord, merely adjust your mindset. Many things are possible when the parts are in the right place.'

rules.name: Rule Chief Alchemist Vol Transmute Gold
rules.displayAs: Can you teach me how transmute gold

dialog.speaker: 'Jafar'
dialog.content: Chief Alchemist Vol, your mastery over corporeal matter is exemplary. I would like nothing more than to learn how you can make one thing into another, how you can make rusty metal into shining gold.
parts: 'Chief Alchemist Vol, your mastery over corporeal matter is exemplary. I would like nothing more than to learn how you can make one thing into another, how you can make rusty metal into shining gold.'

dialog.speaker: 'Chief Alchemist Vol'
dialog.content: What? No I cannot reveal my secrets, they, they, they are my life's work! I am sorry Lord Jafar, this knowledge is mine alone.
parts: 'What? No I cannot reveal my secrets, they, they, they are my life's work! I am sorry Lord Jafar, this knowledge is mine alone.'

dialog.speaker: 'Jafar'
dialog.content: I wish to enter the vault.
parts: 'I wish to enter the vault.'

dialog.speaker: 'Treasury Guard'
dialog.content: Apologies my lord, but I can't let you in without orders.
parts: 'Apologies my lord, but I can't let you in without orders.'

dialog.speaker: 'Jafar'
dialog.content: I have a message from Chief Alchemist Vol.
parts: 'I have a message from Chief Alchemist Vol.'

dialog.speaker: 'Treasury Guard'
dialog.content: Let's see here, hmm, yup that all checks out, you can go ahead.
parts: 'Let's see here, hmm, yup that all checks out, you can go ahead.'

dialog.speaker: 'Jafar'
dialog.content: Loyal servant of the Sultan, I believe you are long overdue for a vacation and some extra pay.
parts: 'Loyal servant of the Sultan, I believe you are long overdue for a vacation and some extra pay.'

dialog.speaker: 'Treasury Guard'
dialog.content: You know, I reckon it is about time I was compensated for my hard work.
parts: 'You know, I reckon it is about time I was compensated for my hard work.'

rules.name: Rule Treasury Chest Decision1
rules.displayAs: Take metal bars for Chief Alchemist Vol
